title: Life 101 : Everything We Wish We Had Learned About Life in School, But Didn't
description: Packed with suggestions for living a more fulfilled and effective life, this book covers all those important subjects we never learnt in school including the meaning of life, how to value ourselves, dealing with guilt, pain, resentment and fear, the power of thought, the value of mistakes, and the power of forgiveness. By the authors of "You Can't Afford the Luxury of a Negative Thought" and "Do It".
author: Peter McWilliams
